eqnarray:
\begin{eqnarray}
&&\Lambda_1^\mu(P, \underline{k}; P, \underline{p})=-[\widetilde{G}^{-1}_1]^\mu(P, \underline{k}; P, \underline{p})\nonumber\\
&&=i\left[
e_2{\partial \widetilde{G}^{-1}_1(P,\underline{k},\underline{p})\over\partial k_\mu}+
{\partial \widetilde{G}^{-1}_1(P,\underline{k},\underline{p})\over\partial p_\mu}e_2+(e_1+e_2)
{\partial \widetilde{G}^{-1}_1(P,\underline{k},\underline{p})\over\partial P_\mu}\right]  \label{WI}
\
